section.name: Plugin's description

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin handles the big data storage, in database or file system.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: Configure the private key for the signature in the file blobstore_context.xml :

div.pre: <bean id="blobstore.hashService" class="fr.paris.lutece.util.signrequest.security.Sha1HashService" /> <bean id="blobstore.requestAuthenticator" class="fr.paris.lutece.util.signrequest.RequestHashAuthenticator" > <property name="hashService" ref="blobstore.hashService" /> <property name="signatureElements" > <list> <value>blobstore</value> <value>blob_key</value> </list> </property> <property name="privateKey"> <value>change me</value> </property> </bean>
